items.sentence: Tom didn't want to do what his father told him to do.
I would've loved to see what Tom had in his suitcase.
We've managed to pollute our atmosphere pretty badly.
Sitting in the front row were several familiar faces.
There were a lot of people on the beach last weekend.
Tom walked into Mary's room, carrying a tray of food.
I don't know how to tell Tom what I need to tell him.
Six witnesses said they saw Tom cheating on the exam.
I thought I would suffocate on the overcrowded train.
Tom didn't want to wash the pot, so he threw it away.
